options.text: Animal species are more than plant species on earth.
Prokaryotic species are more in number in comparison to animal species.
More than 90,000 species of animals are found in India.
India is one of the 12 megadiversity countries in the world.

solution.text:
Some interesting aspects about earth's biodiversity are


 
1. Animal species > 70% - Insects are forming the most species-rich taxonomic group (> 70% of the total animals). - Among vertebrates, half of the species belong to fishes.
2. Plant species (including algae, fungi, bryophytes, gymnosperms and angiosperms) > 22% -Number of Fungi species > Combined number of species of fishes, amphibians, reptiles and mammals. - Among plant species, fungi and angiosperms individually form a little less than half number of species.
3. Other species < 8% - These include prokaryotic and protistan species.
